mutants.code:
import re
from collections import Counter

def word_occurrences(text):
    cleaned_text = re.sub('', '', text)
    words = cleaned_text.lower().split()
    occurrences = Counter(words)
    dict_word_occurrences = {word: count for (word, count) in occurrences.items() if len(word) > 6}
    return dict_word_occurrences

import re
from collections import Counter

def word_occurrences(text):
    cleaned_text = re.sub('[^a-zA-Z\\s]', 'MUTATED', text)
    words = cleaned_text.lower().split()
    occurrences = Counter(words)
    dict_word_occurrences = {word: count for (word, count) in occurrences.items() if len(word) > 6}
    return dict_word_occurrences

mutants.original_line: dict_word_occurrences = {word: count for word, count in occurrences.items() if len(word) > 6}
mutants.mutated_line: dict_word_occurrences = {word: count for (word, count) in occurrences.items() if len(word) >= 6}

import re
